backend/main.mo: Implements access‑controlled user profiles and a public memories system with create, edit, read, and list operations backed by Maps.
backend/migration.mo: Defines persistent canister state types and returns the state unchanged for migrations.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping features to related files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten descriptive summaries for numerous frontend files used in build planning.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining CSS variables for light/dark themes and applying global theme styles.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point that loads the React app from main.tsx into the root div.
frontend/REDEPLOY.md: Non-functional marker file used to trigger a redeploy and document deployment troubleshooting steps.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component handling password and welcome gates, chat-view routing, memory filtering, and page layout.
frontend/src/components/ChatFullPage.tsx: Standalone full-page chat view with header, message list, close button, and themed layout.
frontend/src/components/ChatView.tsx: Provides a full chat interface with message submission, display name handling, auto-scroll, single and bulk delete, and message owner checks.
frontend/src/components/ChatWidget.tsx: Implements a floating chat launcher that opens chat in a new tab or an optional in-page chat panel using ChatView.
frontend/src/components/MemoryEditDialog: A dialog for editing an existing memory with validation, file upload handling, previews, and permission checks.
frontend/src/components/MemoryFullscreen: Displays a memory in a fullscreen modal with metadata, media, view permissions, and an edit option if allowed.
frontend/src/components/MemoryList.tsx: Renders a list of memories, each as a card with metadata, media previews, view and edit access, and fullscreen or edit dialogs.
frontend/src/components/MemorySubmitForm: Form for submitting new memories with text, author, optional media uploads or URLs, validation, previews, and success feedback.
frontend/src/components/MusicBoxWidget.t: Provides a UI for uploading, validating, and playing audio files, including local file handling and playback control for stored songs.
frontend/src/components/PasswordGate.tsx: Renders a username and 4‑digit code login form with validation and error handling to gate access to protected content.
frontend/src/components/VideoViewer.tsx: Displays a modal video player with error fallback handling when a video fails to load or play.
frontend/src/components/WelcomePage.tsx: Shows a styled welcome screen with images and text, offering buttons to continue or lock the app.
frontend/src/components/YouTubeLinksDial: Provides a dialog for submitting YouTube links with validation, listing existing links, and handling submission states.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor instance based on authentication state, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useChat.ts: Implements hooks for fetching, submitting, and deleting chat messages using the backend actor with polling and cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useChatDisplayName.ts: Manages a persistent chat display name across session and local storage with utilities for setting, validating, and clearing it.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity auth state, login, logout, and loaded identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useMemories.ts: Defines React Query hooks to fetch, submit, and edit memories using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/usePasswordGate.ts: Implements a username/password gate with persistence in session and local storage.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file noting removal of old Tingi search logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useSongs.ts: React Query hooks for listing songs and uploading new songs through the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useWelcomeGate.ts: Controls a dismissible welcome screen using session storage state.
frontend/src/hooks/useYouTubeLinks.ts: Provides hooks to fetch and submit YouTube links via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup with custom color variables, themes, fonts, and scrollbar styling.
frontend/src/lib/audio.ts: Utilities to convert files to Uint8Array and to create audio data URLs with MIME guessing.
frontend/src/lib/format.ts: Formats bigint timestamps into readable date or time strings.
frontend/src/lib/lockBackgrounds.ts: Provides a static lock screen background configuration and helpers.
frontend/src/lib/lockPhrases.ts: Provides a static lock screen phrase and helper accessors.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers, then rendering App.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and session keys.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, fonts, container settings, animations, and integrates typography, container queries, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Defines project rollback to Version 21 and tracks issues and feature requests related to memory and chat write persistence.
